Sentencas: The application of infrared thermal imaging to the study of solid oxide fuel cells is demonstrated.
Titulo: Application of infrared thermal imaging to the study of pellet solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The temperature increase accompanying polarisation of gadolinium doped ceria pellet cells is measured and the effect of temperature increase on polarisation characteristics is modelled.
Titulo: Application of infrared thermal imaging to the study of pellet solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Temperature increases of the order of 2.5 degrees C were measured for heavily loaded pellet cells.
Titulo: Application of infrared thermal imaging to the study of pellet solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Measurement accuracy of 0.1 degrees C and spatial resolution of 0.5 mm allow temperature distribution heterogeneity to be clearly discerned.
Titulo: Application of infrared thermal imaging to the study of pellet solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A total heat transfer coefficient is derived from experimental results that allow the development of a model that predicts the extent of self-heating.
Titulo: Application of infrared thermal imaging to the study of pellet solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: For pellet fuel cells, self-heating is not expected to have a large effect on the polarisation characteristics; however, for thin electrolytes and high current density the effect becomes appreciable.
Titulo: Application of infrared thermal imaging to the study of pellet solid oxide fuel cells
